mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_comment(content, user_id, content_id, create_time) VALUES (#{content}, #{userId}, #{contentId}, #{createTime})
mapper.select: SELECT c.id, c.content, c.create_time, u.nick_name, u.img_url userImgUrl FROM t_comment c INNER JOIN t_user u ON c.user_id = u.id WHERE c.content_id = #{contentId} ORDER BY c.create_time DESC
